Small_shields.Name: Small Leather Shield
Small_shields.Notes: This small shield can be found early in the game and provides basic protection.

Small_shields.Name: Leather Shield
Small_shields.Notes: A slightly improved version of the Small Leather Shield, it offers decent protection.

Small_shields.Name: Target Shield
Small_shields.Notes: Known for its parrying capabilities, this shield is favored by those who rely on precise timing.

Small_shields.Name: Buckler
Small_shields.Notes: Similar to the Target Shield, the Buckler is known for its parrying ability.

Small_shields.Name: Cracked Round Shield
Small_shields.Notes: An ordinary shield that provides minimal protection and is easily found in the early game.

Small_shields.Name: Warrior's Round Shield
Small_shields.Notes: This basic shield is favored by warriors and provides decent protection.

Small_shields.Name: Red & White Round Shield
Small_shields.Notes: Found in the Painted World, this shield offers unique aesthetics.

Small_shields.Name: Caduceus Round Shield
Small_shields.Notes: A round shield with a distinctive design that can be found in a dark and treacherous location.

Small_shields.Name: Effigy Shield
Small_shields.Notes: This basic shield is useful in Sen's Fortress, an area filled with traps.

Small_shields.Name: Plank Shield
Small_shields.Notes: Known for its resistance to poison, this shield is suitable for the challenging Blighttown area.

Small_shields.Name: Crystal Ring Shield
Small_shields.Notes: Found in the serene Ash Lake, this shield has unique properties and aesthetics.

standard_shields.Name: Gargoyle's Shield
standard_shields.Location: Dropped by Bell Gargoyles in the Undead Parish.
standard_shields.Notes: A heavy shield used by the Gargoyles of the Undead Parish, it can deflect spells and protect the wielder from airborne assaults.

standard_shields.Name: East-West Shield
standard_shields.Location: Sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown.
standard_shields.Notes: A unique shield with unique capabilities.

standard_shields.Name: Wooden Shield
standard_shields.Location: Starting equipment for several classes. Also found in the Undead Burg.
standard_shields.Notes: A plain wooden shield that can be used to block physical damage.

standard_shields.Name: Large Leather Shield
standard_shields.Location: Starting equipment for Bandit class. Sold by Domhnall of Zena in the Depths.
standard_shields.Notes: A large, high stability leather shield.

standard_shields.Name: Heater Shield
standard_shields.Location: Starting equipment for several classes. Sold by Undead Male Merchant in Undead Burg.
standard_shields.Notes: A basic but reliable heater shield.

standard_shields.Name: Knight Shield
standard_shields.Location: Starting equipment for Knight class.
standard_shields.Notes: A shield with a Knight's Coat of Arms, it has high fire and lightning resistance.

standard_shields.Name: Tower Kite Shield
standard_shields.Location: Sold by Andre of Astora in Sen's Fortress.
standard_shields.Notes: A large wooden shield used by the proud knights of Berenike, known for their heavy armor and Black Iron Tarkus.

standard_shields.Name: Caduceus Kite Shield
standard_shields.Location: Sold by Oswald of Carim.
standard_shields.Notes: A small wooden shield decorated with a giant upward-pointing mace.

standard_shields.Name: Hollow Soldier Shield
standard_shields.Location: Starting equipment for Warrior class.
standard_shields.Notes: A common wooden shield used by soldiers.

standard_shields.Name: Balder Shield
standard_shields.Location: Dropped by Balder Knights in Undead Parish or sold by Undead Male Merchant in Undead Burg.
standard_shields.Notes: A Balder shield is a round shield with a unique, notched design.

standard_shields.Name: Sunlight Shield
standard_shields.Location: Sold by Solaire of Astora in Anor Londo.
standard_shields.Notes: Shield of Solaire of Astora, Knight of Sunlight.

standard_shields.Name: Iron Round Shield
standard_shields.Location: Starting equipment for Bandit class.
standard_shields.Notes: A simple round iron shield.

standard_shields.Name: Silver Knight Shield
standard_shields.Location: Dropped by Silver Knights in Anor Londo.
standard_shields.Notes: Shield of the Silver Knights of Anor Londo.

standard_shields.Name: Black Knight Shield
standard_shields.Location: Dropped by Black Knights in Undead Burg, Undead Parish, or Kiln of the First Flame.
standard_shields.Notes: A pitch-black wooden shield, on the small side.

standard_shields.Name: Pierce Shield
standard_shields.Location: Starting equipment for Warrior class.
standard_shields.Notes: Small metal shield.

standard_shields.Name: Spiked Shield
standard_shields.Location: Sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown.
standard_shields.Notes: A unique shield with unique capabilities.

standard_shields.Name: Crest Shield
standard_shields.Location: Dropped by Oscar, Knight of Astora in Undead Asylum, or in the Crystal Cave.
standard_shields.Notes: A standard, widely used shield.

standard_shields.Name: Dragon Crest Shield
standard_shields.Location: Sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown.
standard_shields.Notes: A standard, widely used shield.

standard_shields.Name: Grass Crest Shield
standard_shields.Location: Located in Darkroot Basin, near Black Knight.
standard_shields.Notes: The Grass Crest is lightly imbued with magic, which slightly speeds stamina recovery.

standard_shields.Name: Spider Shield
standard_shields.Location: Located in the Depths, near the giant rat.
standard_shields.Notes: An ordinary shield used by low-ranking knights.

standard_shields.Name: Bloodshield
standard_shields.Location: Dropped by Crossbreed Priscilla in the Painted World of Ariamis.
standard_shields.Notes: Shield bearing a large etching of a brilliant flame.

standard_shields.Name: Sanctus
standard_shields.Location: Found in the Tomb of the Giants, after the first bonewheel skeleton and before the first fog gate.
standard_shields.Notes: An especially hard leather shield, decorated with the holy symbol of the sun, which greatly reduces fire damage.

standard_shields.Name: Crystal Shield
standard_shields.Location: Sold by Domhnall of Zena in the Depths.
standard_shields.Notes: Small round crystal shield.

great_shields.Name: Bonewheel Shield
great_shields.Location: Dropped by Bonewheel Skeletons in the Painted World of Ariamis.
great_shields.Notes: An eerie-looking shield with a wheel attached to the central spike. It can be used to attack enemies.

great_shields.Name: Tower Shield
great_shields.Location: Sold by Andre of Astora in Sen's Fortress.
great_shields.Notes: A giant, vertical greatshield used by the knights of the Cathedral of the Deep.

great_shields.Name: Stone Greatshield
great_shields.Location: Sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown.
great_shields.Notes: A great shield with an ominous face. It is said to repel all kinds of magic.

great_shields.Name: Eagle Shield
great_shields.Location: Dropped by Berenike Knights in Sen's Fortress.
great_shields.Notes: A great shield with an eagle etched on its face. It greatly reduces lightning damage.

great_shields.Name: Black Iron Greatshield
great_shields.Location: Dropped by Black Iron Tarkus in Sen's Fortress.
great_shields.Notes: Shield of Black Iron Tarkus, one of Gwyn's Four Knights, found in the heavy iron armor.

great_shields.Name: Havel's Greatshield
great_shields.Location: Found in Anor Londo, behind an illusory wall. Obtainable after defeating Havel the Rock.
great_shields.Notes: Shield of Havel the Rock, cut from a boulder, provides great stability.

great_shields.Name: Greatshield of Artorias
great_shields.Location: Created with any +10 shield (except Crystal Ring Shield), along with the Soul of Sif at the Giant Blacksmith.
great_shields.Notes: Created from the soul of Sif. It has a unique power: it can deflect spells.

great_shields.Name: Giant Shield
great_shields.Location: Sold by the Giant Blacksmith in Anor Londo.
great_shields.Notes: One of the gigantic straight greatshields. This solid piece of iron can endure great punishment.

great_shields.Name: Cleansing Greatshield
great_shields.Location: Created with any +10 shield, along with the Soul of Priscilla at the Giant Blacksmith.
great_shields.Notes: A greatshield used by the Warrior cleric. Imbued with a special power that greatly reduces dark damage.
